subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Sherron Collins had 17 points in his final game at Allen Fieldhouse, and No. 2 Kansas beat No. 5 Kansas State, 82-65, to clinch its sixth straight Big 12 regular-season title.
snippet: Sherron Collins had 17 points in his final game at Allen Fieldhouse, and No. 2 Kansas beat No. 5 Kansas State, 82-65, to clinch its sixth straight Big 12 regular-season title.
